title: Freshfields Poaches Top Deal Lawyer From Cravath
sub_head: Damien Zoubek is the latest high-profile lawyer to switch firms amid talent war
body:
Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer LLP is poaching a top deal maker from Cravath, Swaine & Moore LLP, the latest offensive in a talent war among big law firms seeking to cash in on a boom in mergers and other transactions.
Damien Zoubek, who has been at Cravath since 1999, will join Freshfields as its co-head of corporate and mergers and acquisitions alongside Ethan Klingsberg, the firm said.
